mapper.select: select id, employee_id, employee_name, department_name, job_property, department_line, confirmation_content_flag, confirmation_signature_flag, birthday_card, birthday_archives, birthday_judgment, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, starting_job_time_own, starting_job_time_archvies, starting_job_time_judgment, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degree_judgment, marterial_supplement_remark, electronic_paper_check_flag, check_user, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.employee_info where id = #{id}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, department_name, job_property, department_line, confirmation_content_flag, confirmation_signature_flag, birthday_card, birthday_archives, birthday_judgment, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, starting_job_time_own, starting_job_time_archvies, starting_job_time_judgment, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degree_judgment, marterial_supplement_remark, electronic_paper_check_flag, check_user, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.employee_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, department_name, job_property, department_line, confirmation_content_flag, confirmation_signature_flag, birthday_card, birthday_archives, birthday_judgment, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, starting_job_time_own, starting_job_time_archvies, starting_job_time_judgment, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degree_judgment, marterial_supplement_remark, electronic_paper_check_flag, check_user, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.employee_info
mapper.insert: insert into archivesmanagementsystem.employee_info(employee_id, employee_name, department_name, job_property, department_line, confirmation_content_flag, confirmation_signature_flag, birthday_card, birthday_archives, birthday_judgment, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, starting_job_time_own, starting_job_time_archvies, starting_job_time_judgment, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degree_judgment, marterial_supplement_remark, electronic_paper_check_flag, check_user, update_by, update_time) values (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{departmentName}, #{jobProperty}, #{departmentLine}, #{confirmationContentFlag}, #{confirmationSignatureFlag}, #{birthdayCard}, #{birthdayArchives}, #{birthdayJudgment}, #{joinPartyTime}, #{joinPartyIntroducer}, #{joinGroupTime}, #{startingJobTimeOwn}, #{startingJobTimeArchvies}, #{startingJobTimeJudgment}, #{educationDegree}, #{educationBackgroud}, #{educationBackgroudJudgment}, #{educationDegreeJudgment}, #{marterialSupplementRemark}, #{electronicPaperCheckFlag}, #{checkUser}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update archivesmanagementsystem.employee_info
employee_id = #{employeeId},
employee_name = #{employeeName},
department_name = #{departmentName},
job_property = #{jobProperty},
department_line = #{departmentLine},
confirmation_content_flag = #{confirmationContentFlag},
confirmation_signature_flag = #{confirmationSignatureFlag},
birthday_card = #{birthdayCard},
birthday_archives = #{birthdayArchives},
birthday_judgment = #{birthdayJudgment},
join_party_time = #{joinPartyTime},
join_party_introducer = #{joinPartyIntroducer},
join_group_time = #{joinGroupTime},
starting_job_time_own = #{startingJobTimeOwn},
starting_job_time_archvies = #{startingJobTimeArchvies},
starting_job_time_judgment = #{startingJobTimeJudgment},
education_degree = #{educationDegree},
education_backgroud = #{educationBackgroud},
education_backgroud_judgment = #{educationBackgroudJudgment},
education_degree_judgment = #{educationDegreeJudgment},
marterial_supplement_remark = #{marterialSupplementRemark},
electronic_paper_check_flag = #{electronicPaperCheckFlag},
check_user = #{checkUser},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
